price: 118. »Si los castigas, son tus siervos; y si los perdonas, Tú eres el Poderoso, el Sabio».
arabic: إِن تُعَذِّبۡهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ عِبَادُكَۖ وَإِن تَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ فَإِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: in tuʿadhib'hum fa-innahum ʿibāduka wa-in taghfir lahum fa-innaka anta al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
